front.title: IEEE/NACE Draft Guide to Strength Loss of Tubular Steel Poles

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This NACE/IEEE joint standard provides a methodology to evaluate the strength loss of tubular steel poles due to corrosion. Such an evaluation will allow informed, cost and risk-based decisions on the primary actionable asset management options available for such poles including continuing to monitor, remediation, or replacement.
